name: Living Book of Storms
description: An ancient book transforms into a living diorama with ships battling through storms

visual_core.description: An ancient book transforms into a living diorama of a stormy sea with {ship_description} battling the tempest, culminating with magical glowing text materializing above the scene.
visual_core.camera: macro close-up glide ‚Üí pullback reveal ‚Üí wide diorama shot
visual_core.lighting: dim library glow ‚Üí lightning flashes with harsh shadows
visual_core.environment: old library desk, candlelight, pages of the book becoming ocean waves

elements: ancient open book with yellowed pages
lightning flash casting shadow across desk
glowing magical text '{cta_text}' floating above the scene

audio.sfx: book pages rustling, distant thunder rumble, storm fade-in
audio.ambience: silent library background ‚Üí storm sounds ‚Üí wind howl, creaking wood

timeline.action: Extreme close-up glides across the book's yellowed pages, revealing an illustration of {ship_description} on rough seas. Silence fills the library.
timeline.camera: macro glide shot across ink lines of the illustration
timeline.audio: quiet book rustling + faint distant thunder

timeline.action: The illustration swells upward, transforming into a three-dimensional stormy ocean. The paper darkens as waves rise, spraying mist.
timeline.camera: slow pullback as ocean forms inside book

timeline.action: The {ship_description} becomes a real {ship_material} model with tiny {crew_type} {crew_action} as it rides up and down the waves, bow cutting through water. Lightning flashes. Shadows cut across the desk.
timeline.camera: wide reveal of full diorama with cinematic storm lighting
timeline.audio: wind howl + thunder strike + creaking wood

timeline.action: As the storm gradually calms, the words '{cta_text}' slowly materialize in elegant serif letters, glowing softly like ancient magic inscriptions floating above the misty book.
timeline.camera: gentle zoom focusing on the glowing text above the diorama
timeline.audio: storm fading to gentle mystical chime

cta.motion: Final freeze frame of the storm contained within the book, mist drifting upward.
cta.style: dramatic serif typography emerging from mist

metadata.ship_description: Viking longship with fierce dragon head prow
metadata.crew_action: rowing rhythmically while chanting war songs

metadata.ship_description: three-masted pirate frigate with skull flag
metadata.crew_action: swinging from rigging and manning cannons

metadata.ship_description: Chinese treasure ship with red sails
HMS Victory-style ship of the line
